name: MySql
description:
MySQL is an open source relational database management system (RDBMS) based on Structured Query Language (SQL). MySQL is an important component of LAMP stack based applications. 
This app creates a 3 VM Active/Passive database service.
#### License:
* GPL Version 2.0
#### Hardware Requirement:
* By default, three VMs each with 2 vCPU and 4GB RAM
#### Resources Installed:
* Mysql-5.6.
#### Operating System:
* CentOS Linux release 7.4.1708
* Select the [AWS AMI](https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/fulfillment?productId=b7ee8a69-ee97-4a49-9e68-afaee216db2e&ref_=dtl_psb_continue) according to the region.
#### Platform:
* AHV
* AWS
#### Lifecycle:
* Backup
* Restore
#### Limitations:
* Upgrade not available.
* For evaluation purpose only. Not recommended for production use.
#### Other Instructions:
* Open port `3306` on AWS Security Group and Firewall. 
#### Accessibility:
* sudo mysql -u root -p[PASSWORD]  
* default password [ nutanix/4u ]
author: Nutanix
